primitive_skills.annotations: Open the cabinet above and pick up the green cup from in there.
Heat the cup in the microwave.
Put the heated cup in the cabinet next to the microwave.

annotation: Put a heated cup in a cabinet.

primitive_skills.annotations: Pick up the knife next to the toaster
Cut the lettuce
Put the knife in the sink
Pick up a slice of lettuce
Wash the lettuce
Put the lettuce in the black bin

annotation: Put a washed slice of lettuce in a bin.

primitive_skills.annotations: Pick up the knife from the counter.
Cut the loaf of bread.
Place the knife on the counter.
Pick up a slice of bread from the middle of the loaf.
Open the fridge and place the bread inside and then shut the fridge briefly before opening it again and picking up the slice of bread.
Place the slice of bread inside the microwave.

annotation: Place a chilled slice of bread into the microwave.

primitive_skills.annotations: Pick up the lettuce next to the toaster.
Place the lettuce in the fridge, let it cool, and take it back out.
Place the lettuce in the sink.

annotation: Place the cooled lettuce in the sink.

primitive_skills.annotations: Pick the toilet paper roll up.
Open the second cabinet door from the right.
Go to the area between the cabinets and the toilet, pick up the empty toilet paper tube behind the toilet brush.
Place the toilet paper tube upright to the left of the full toilet paper roll, close the cabinet door.

annotation: Place the toilet paper roll and empty tube in the cabinet.

primitive_skills.annotations: Take a tomato off of the counter in front of you.
Place the tomato in the sink in front of you.
Take the knife from the sink in front of you.
Slice the tomato in the sink in front of you.
Place the knife in the sink in front of you.
Take a tomato slice from the sink in front of you.
Heat up the tomato slice in the microwave and take the tomato out.
Place the warm tomato slice in the sink in front of you.

annotation: Place a warm tomato slice in the sink.

primitive_skills.annotations: Pick the tomato up from the sink.
Put the tomato in the microwave and shut the door and then open the door and pick up the tomato.
Put the tomato in the trash can.

annotation: Put a heated tomato in the trash can.

primitive_skills.annotations: Pick up the fork that's on the right of the sink.
Put the fork into the green cup on the second shelf in the fridge.
Take the cup with fork out of the fridge.
Put the cup and fork on the counter in front of the bread to the right of the knife.

annotation: Put the chilled green cup and fork on the counter in front of the bread.

primitive_skills.annotations: pick up the soap off of the toilet
throw the soap in to the trash can
pick up the soap on the toilet
throw the soap into the trash

annotation: Throw both pieces of soap into the trash can.

primitive_skills.annotations: Pick up the smaller silver knife on the counter.
Put the knife in the green cup in the sink.
Pick up the cup with knife in the sink.
Put the cup with knife on the counter, in front of the spoon and plate.

annotation: Put a cup with knife in it, on the counter.

primitive_skills.annotations: Take the apple on the right from the sink.
Put the apple on the right of the statue and in front of the salt.
Take the knife from the counter.
Cut the apple into pieces.
Cut the apple in the sink into pieces.
Put the knife in the sink.
Take a piece of apple from the sink.
Put the piece of apple to the left of the other cut apple.

annotation: Put a piece of apple on a counter near another cut apple.

primitive_skills.annotations: close the notebook computer and pick up from the dresser
turn on the lamp left  of the white sofa

annotation: Examine a notebook computer by the light of a lamp.

primitive_skills.annotations: Pick up the watch from the top shelf.
Open the safe and put the watch in it, then close the safe.

annotation: Place a watch inside a safe.

primitive_skills.annotations: Put the bar of soap down on the counter in between the sinks.
Put the bar of soap down in the bin.
Pick up the bar of soap to the left of the spray bottle.
Put the bar of soap in the gold bin to the left of the first bar of soap.

annotation: To move two bars of soap to the gold bin.

primitive_skills.annotations: Pick up the butter knife that is in front of the bowl on the counter.
Cut the apple that is in the garbage can into slices.
Put the knife in the garbage can.
Pick up a slice of apple that is in the garbage can.
Put the apple in the microwave and turn it on to cook, remove the cooked apple from the microwave.
Put the slice of apple on the counter to the right of the statue.

annotation: Put cooked apple slice on a counter.

primitive_skills.annotations: Take the CD from the desk.
Open the safe, put the CD in the safe, close the safe.
Take the CD from the desk.
Open the safe, put the CD in the safe, close the safe.

annotation: Put cds in a safe.

primitive_skills.annotations: Pick up the clock that is on the desk.
Turn on the lamp that is sitting on the desk.

annotation: Examine an alarm clock using the light of a lamp.

primitive_skills.annotations: Pick up the keys behind the statue, on the dresser.
Place the keys in the safe, on the floor.
Pick up the keys between the cardboard box and the pillow on the couch.
Place the keys in the back, right corner of the safe.

annotation: Put two sets of keys in the safe.

primitive_skills.annotations: Pick up the pencil from the desk which is under the cell phone.
Turn on the lamp.

annotation: Examine a pencil by the light of a desk lamp.

primitive_skills.annotations: Pick up the keys on the right cushion of the couch.
Place the keys in the safe on the floor.
Pick up the keys on the seat of the chair.
Place the keys in the safe on the floor.

annotation: Put two sets of keys in the safe.

primitive_skills.annotations: Pick up the laptop on the right after closing it.
Turn on the floor lamp.

annotation: Examine a laptop using the light of a floor lamp.

primitive_skills.annotations: Pick up the bowl on the desk.
Turn on the lamp.

annotation: Examine a bowl by the lamp.

primitive_skills.annotations: Pick up the book from the bed.
Turn on the lamp.

annotation: Examine the book by lamp light.

primitive_skills.annotations: pick up the box on the bottom shelf
turn on the lamp

annotation: Examine the box in the lamp light.

primitive_skills.annotations: Pick up the soap on the tank
Open the cabinet and put in the soap then close the cabinet
Pick up the soap on the counter
Open the cabinet and put in the soap then close the cabinet

annotation: Put two soap in the cabinet.

primitive_skills.annotations: pick up a cushion on the left
place the cushion on the couch to the left of the remote
pick up the last cushion on the chair
place the second cushion so that it is standing up vertically and to the right of the first cushion

annotation: Arrange cushion one and two taken from the grey chair on the white couch.

primitive_skills.annotations: Pick up the leftmost pillow off of the seat of the chair.
Put the pillow vertically on the couch to the right of the newspaper.
Pick up the pillow off of the seat of the blue chair.
Put the pillow vertically on the couch to the left of the newspaper.

annotation: Move two pillows to the couch.

primitive_skills.annotations: Grab the box on the sofa
Turn on the floor lamp

annotation: Grab the box on the sofa, turn on the lamp by the sofa.

primitive_skills.annotations: Pick up the disc on the desk.
Turn on the lamp on the desk.

annotation: Pick up the disc and turn on the lamp on the desk.

primitive_skills.annotations: Close the laptop and pick it up.
Look up and turn on the standing lamp next to the sofa.

annotation: Turn on the lamp next to the sofa while holding a laptop computer.

primitive_skills.annotations: Pick up the CD on the left.
Put the CD in the safe.
Face the desk and pick up the CD.
Put the CD in the safe.

annotation: Put two cds in the safe.

primitive_skills.annotations: Pick up the bar of soap.
Put the bar of soap in the sink, turn the water on and then off and then pick up the bar of soap.
Put the soap down in between the two sinks.

annotation: Put a clean bar of soap on the counter.

primitive_skills.annotations: Pick up the white bar of soap closest to the wall
Open the far left cabinet door under the sink on the left.
Pick up the white bar of soap above the orange roll.
Open the cabinet and place the white soap inside on the shelf left of the other bar of white soap.

annotation: Place two bars of white soap on the shelf in the cabinet.

primitive_skills.annotations: Open the left cabinet and take out the blue rag.
Wash the rag in the sink.
Place the rag on the counter behind the soap bottle.

annotation: Place a clean rag on a counter.

primitive_skills.annotations: Pick up the bat from the floor.
Turn on the lamp.

annotation: Examine a bat by the light of a lamp.

primitive_skills.annotations: Pick up the bat from the floor.
Turn on the lamp on the desk.

annotation: Examine the bad under the light on the desk.

primitive_skills.annotations: Pick up the white pencil on the desk.
Place the white pencil on the desk near the books.

annotation: Pick up the white pencil on the desk and put it on another spot on the desk.

primitive_skills.annotations: Pick up the bar of soap from the counter.
Wet the soap with water.
Put the soap back on the counter.

annotation: Put a wet soap on the counter.

primitive_skills.annotations: Open the lower left drawer, and take the green towel out.
Place the towel under the faucet to soak it.
Place the wet towel back in the drawer.

annotation: Get a towel out of the drawer to soak it, then put it back in the drawer.

primitive_skills.annotations: Pick up the plunger from between the sink and the toilet
Open the cabinet just to the left and place the plunger inside

annotation: Put the plunger under the sink.
